response_parsed.title: Packaging Batch Jobs Using FastAPI with Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This guide will demonstrate how to create a batch job system using the FastAPI framework in Python 3.12+, enabling asynchronous processing of multiple tasks.
key_points: Create FastAPI app and define endpoints for starting and checking status of jobs
Implement queue management using a library such as Redis or RabbitMQ
Design worker processes to consume and process queued jobs
Utilize FastAPI's built-in support for asynchronous functions
Leverage Python 3.12+ features like assignment expressions and improved type hints
version_notes: Python 3.12+ is required for improved type hints, assignment expressions, and other new features
FastAPI >=0.75.0 is recommended for better support of asynchronous functions
caveats: Proper error handling should be implemented to ensure jobs are retried if they fail
Queue management libraries like Redis and RabbitMQ require additional setup and configuration
